name: F-1
overview: G.P. Simulator is a car simulation video game with scenarios and features based on the Formula 1 World Championship that takes place every year in numerous circuits around the globe. It has effects and conditions that give addiction that few programs of it gender they have. Among these effects we can mention the possibility of entering the pits in certain moments of the race, changing tires, having 4 different types, each for one determined situation; refuel; replace the motor if it is in poor condition; on-board computer, which will inform you at all times of the state of tires, engine, laps, end of race and a long etcetera of details that you can check yourself when get hooked on this program with great realism and fun that will test to the best pilots.
